name: Richard ULRICH, Appellant v. Governor Tom WOLF, Secretary John Wetzel, Superintendent Tammy Ferguson, Appellees

parties: Richard ULRICH, Appellant v. Governor Tom WOLF, Secretary John Wetzel, Superintendent Tammy Ferguson, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of August, 2016, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
143 A.3d 929
Richard ULRICH, Appellant v. Governor Tom WOLF, Secretary John Wetzel, Superintendent Tammy Ferguson, Appellees.
